original_title: UFC Fight Night 63: Mendes vs. Lamas
overview: UFC Fight Night 63: Mendes vs. Lamas was a mixed martial arts event held on April 4, 2015, at the Patriot Center in Fairfax, Virginia. The event was headlined by a featherweight bout between former title challengers Chad Mendes and Ricardo Lamas.
title: UFC Fight Night 63: Mendes vs. Lamas
